page.title: 03CLUBS/ORGANISATINS _ BORTH
page.content: Borth has a wide variety of clubs and organisations catering for most ages and interests. {Beavers}_ First group in Dyfed. For boys of 6_8. Weekly, Friday. {Cubs}_ Weekly Friday evenings. {Scouts}_ Weekly Friday evenings. {Brownies}_ Weekly Thursday evenings. {Guides }_ Weekly Monday evenings.{ {Pottery Club }_ Geoff Bond, a Dyfed potter runs this weekly children's club. {Youth Club}_ Weekly Wednesday evening {Women's Fellowship }_ This meets twice monthly on Tuesdays at Gerlan Chapel. {W.I}_ Fortnightly at the Public Hall. {Mothers' Union}_ Monthly on Mondays. {Clwb Trafod Llenyddiaeth Cymraeg }_ A Welsh Literary Club. {Senior Citizens}_ Fortnightly meetings
